Benefits of Registration

  • Connect with the OnTheSnow community by contributing ratings, reviews, blog posts and comments
  • Receive prize entries and other perks for each resort review you submit
  • Save your favorite resorts and easily check snow reports
  • Get snow updates and deals from your favorite resorts
  • Personalized news and information so you can get the content you need right away.
